metadata.description: Architecture scalability experiment (Pursuit-Evasion): Tests whether phi-network depth and width matter for scale invariance on PE task. Parallel to Rendezvous variant for cross-task comparison. 54 configs matching RV structure.
metadata.design_rationale: Identical architecture matrix to RV variant: 3 pursuer counts [10,50,100] x 2 activations [relu,tanh] x 3 phi-depths [1,2,4] x 3 phi-widths [32,64,128] x 1 seed = 54 configs. Cross-task validation of architectural insensitivity to network size.

matrix_parameters.description: Core factorial matrix: 3 pursuer counts x 2 activations x 3 phi-depths x 3 phi-widths x 1 seed = 54 unique configs. Auto-expanded via config_utils.py.

pursuer_count_selection.description: Pursuer counts [10, 50, 100] span 10x range, matching RV variant for cross-task comparison.
pursuer_count_selection.note: PE task has more dynamic evader behavior than rendezvous, so architectural effects may be more pronounced.

activation_selection.description: Same as RV: [relu, tanh] to test activation effects.

phi_depth_selection.description: Depths [1, 2, 4] test minimal to deep architectures.
phi_depth_selection.note: On PE task, deeper networks may provide modest benefit due to complex evader dynamics. Testing across depth levels validates whether this is true.

phi_width_selection.description: Widths [32, 64, 128] test network capacity for feature extraction.
phi_width_selection.note: PE observation space similar to rendezvous (large padding to max_pursuers=100), so width variation is equally meaningful.

embed_dim.reasoning: Fixed at baseline. Embedding dimension tested separately in embedding_scaling_pursuit_evasion.

policy_layers.reasoning: Downstream policy network, orthogonal to phi-network architecture.

cross_task_comparison.description: 54 configs with identical (pursuer_count, activation, phi_depth, phi_width) structure enable side-by-side comparison of architecture effects between rendezvous and PE tasks.
cross_task_comparison.expected_difference: PE may show more sensitivity to architecture due to dynamic evader. If not, strengthens the 'simplicity suffices' claim across diverse task types.

_example_n10_relu_d1_w32.description: Smallest team, simplest phi, narrowest hidden.

_example_n100_tanh_d4_w128.description: Maximum team, deep phi, widest hidden.

experiments._abbreviated: Full 54 core configs auto-generated from matrix_parameters by config_utils.py. Naming: num_pursuers{N}_{activation}_d{depth}_w{width}_seed{S}.
